sentences.en: Many districts have reduced time for the arts, history, science, civics, foreign languages, physical education, literature, and geography.
sentences.cn: 许多地区减少了艺术、历史、科学、公民学、外语、体育、文学和地理的时间。

sentences.en: Christina's love of American civics began early.
sentences.cn: 克里斯蒂娜对于美国民众的热爱由来甚早。
